text: Luís Ribeiro Pinto Neto (November 16, 1946 - February 11, 2022), best known as Lula, was a Brazilian footballer. He played as a left winger. He also was a manager.Profile at Globo Esporte's Futpedia Profile at Sambafoot He played for the national team between 1971 until 1977. Lula was born in Arcoverde, Brazil. Lula died on February 11, 2022 in Recife, Brazil from cardiac arrest at the age of 75.Morre Lula, ponta-esquerda bicampeão brasileiro com o Inter ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Pernambuco Category:Brazilian football managers
title: Lula (footballer, born 1946)
